alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 2:56PM CDT until June 15 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Southern Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Northern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 345 PM CDT/245 PM MDT/. * At 256 PM CDT/156 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Johnson City to 7 miles north of Hickok, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Hamilton, southern Kearny, northern Grant and northeastern Stanton Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
